name: Trevixia
slogan: Inspired by Nature. Built for Technology
description: Trevixia is a product-focused software company that designs and engineers robust digital solutions for modern businesses. Based in Chennai, India, we combine deep technical expertise with thoughtful product design to deliver software that scales.
shortDescription: Product-focused software engineering from Chennai, India.

brand.plantDescription: The Trevesia palmata, known as the snowflake plant, is a tropical species recognized for its large, deeply lobed, snowflake-shaped leaves. Native to the Himalayas and Southeast Asia, it thrives in diverse conditions while maintaining structural integrity and beauty.

mission: To engineer software products that solve real problems with precision, reliability, and scale.

values.title: Engineering Excellence
values.description: We hold our code to the highest standards. Clean architecture, thorough testing, and continuous improvement define our engineering culture.

values.title: Product Thinking
values.description: Every feature we ship is grounded in user research and business impact. We build with purpose, not just technology.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: Our systems are designed for uptime and resilience. We architect for failure scenarios and optimize for performance at scale.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Open communication across teams, clear documentation, and honest timelines are how we build trust with every stakeholder.

products.name: FlowBoard
products.description: A collaborative project management tool built for distributed engineering teams. Real-time task tracking, sprint planning, and team analytics.

products.name: VaultKey
products.description: Enterprise-grade secrets management and access control. Securely store, rotate, and audit API keys, credentials, and certificates.

products.name: PixelCraft
products.description: A design-to-code platform that bridges the gap between designers and developers. Export production-ready components from design files.

products.name: DevNest
products.description: Cloud-based development environments with pre-configured toolchains. Spin up isolated workspaces in seconds for any project.
